thread.title: Districts Diversify Languages Offered in Dual-Immersion
thread.title_full: Districts Diversify Languages Offered in Dual-Immersion

title: Districts Diversify Languages Offered in Dual-Immersion
text:
25 Districts Diversify Languages Offered in Dual-Immersion 
Education Week: As demand for dual-language-programs surges around the country, school districts are beginning to offer students a broader array of target languages to learn.School leaders in New York City, the nation's largest district, are expanding their dual-language offerings beyond Spanish and Mandarin to include Russian, Hebrew, Japanese, and Haitian Creole.
